is-promise

Test whether an object looks like a promises-a+ promise

Installation

Client:

$ component install then/is-promise

Server:

$ npm install is-promise

API

```javascript var isPromise = require(‘is-promise’);

isPromise({then:function () {…}});//=>true isPromise(null);//=>false isPromise({});//=>false isPromise({then: true})//=>false ```
